featurelist.description: This feature ensures that you have the exact same file when you load corruption settings from others. If you do not have the exact same file, a file of thesame name will be selected if it exists. In this case, you will be warned that it may not be the intended corruption target.
featurelist.author: Rikerz

featurelist.featurename: File and Directory selection dialogs now start in their current or previous directory.
featurelist.author: Rikerz

featurelist.description: This feature allows several corruptions to be performed in sequence on the same file. This allows the corruption of multiple byte ranges, among other things.
featurelist.author: Rikerz

featurelist.description: Added 'Add From File' to queue feature. The Queue feature window is now not resiziable.
featurelist.author: Rikerz

featurelist.featurename: UI Cleaned up for smaller screens
featurelist.description: The Queue controls, Run/Save/Load button, and related functions remain accessible from every tab.
featurelist.author: Rikerz

featurelist.description: UI is completely redone in WPF.
featurelist.author: doomy
